pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 3, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A at the Canada Youth Summit.

Residence Commons
Carleton University
1125 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with staff from Carleton Universityâ€™s independent newspaper The Charlatan to mark World Press Freedom Day.

The Charlatan Newsroom
University Centre
Carleton University
1125 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
